subject: Lisa
sentence: Lisa believed every word Peter said.
paragraph: Lisa always trusted her instincts. She had known Peter for years and admired his honesty. Lisa believed every word Peter said. She felt reassured by his sincerity. As they walked on, she realized how much trust she had in him.

subject: The child

subject: The diet
paragraph: In an attempt to lose weight quickly, many turn to fad diets. These diets often promise rapid results. The diet lacked essential vitamins. Over time, this can lead to health problems. It's always important to approach diet changes with caution and balance.

subject: Alice
